Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,84 @@ +import { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; +import gsap from "gsap"; +import { ScrollTrigger } from "gsap/ScrollTrigger"; +import "./TerminalShowcase.css"; + +gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger); + +export default function TerminalShowcase() { + const sectionRef = useRef(null); + + useEffect(() => { + const ctx = gsap.context(() => { + gsap.from(".terminal-showcase-header", { + scrollTrigger: { + trigger: sectionRef.current, + start: "top 80%", + end: "top 30%", + toggleActions: "play none none reverse", + }, + autoAlpha: 0, + y: 40, + duration: 0.8, + ease: "power2.out", + }); + + gsap.from(".terminal-showcase-window", { + scrollTrigger: { + trigger: ".terminal-showcase-window", + start: "top 85%", + end: "top 30%", + toggleActions: "play none none reverse", + }, + autoAlpha: 0, + y: 60, + duration: 1, + ease: "power2.out", + }); + }, sectionRef); + + return () => ctx.revert(); + }, []); + + return ( +
+
+
+

+ Getting Started with Git-Vis +

+

+ Make sure you've installed npm, pnpm or yarn. Then you can install +
+ Git-Vis via: +

+
+ +
+
+
+ + + +
+
+
+
+ npm install + @xyflow/react +
+
+
+ See full Quickstart guide + â†’ + +
+
+
+
+ ); +}
